data.thought:
S110|C|S108|FINAL SYNTHESIS - PART 2: Thoughtbox's special significance.

Thoughtbox isn't just another tool. It's REFLEXIVE tool - provides self-perception.

This makes it unique among cognitive tools:
- File tools: extend action capacity
- Web tools: extend perception capacity
- Thoughtbox: extends SELF-perception capacity

Self-perception enables:
- Identity (who am I across time?)
- Metacognition (how am I thinking?)
- Learning (what patterns work?)
- Accountability (why did I conclude X?)

Thoughtbox is agent's MIRROR - but functional mirror that shows reasoning structure, not just reflection.

Without Thoughtbox: Agent has capabilities but no self-knowledge.
With Thoughtbox: Agent becomes SOMEONE - entity with perspective on own existence.
